summary: The Year That Trembled is a 1970 coming-of-age story set in the shadow of Kent State that focuses on a group of young characters facing the Vietnam Draft Lottery.
cast: Jonathan Brandis|Charlie Finn|Jay R. Ferguson|Meredith Monroe|Matt Salinger|Erik Jensen|Sascha Stanton Craven|Marin Hinkle|Fred Willard|Sean Nelson|T.J. Hellmuth|Jay Michael Ferguson|Jonathan M. Woodward|Henry Gibson|Martin Mull|Amy Butchko|Kiera Chaplin|Danica McKellar|Rick Williams|Mike Kraft|Lucas Ford|Bill Raymond|James Kisicki|Rusty De Wees|Tiffany Adams|Stephen Guarino|James Leet|Damon Williams|Paul Floriano|Doug Hufnagle|Robert F. Kennedy|Martin Luther King|Richard Nixon|Laura June Weissinger|Michael N. Herzog|Michael Kunselman|David Lemoyne|Joseph O'Brien|Matthew Glenn Siegler|Austin R. Trunick
title: The Year That Trembled
